text.div:
HSPC Adoption Info

A set of codes that describe patient info viewing privileges base on adoption status.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/patient-hspc-adoptionInfo defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
526742432 Adopted Birth RecordAn indication that the medical records being viewed are from a time prior to a patient's adoption and therefore cannot be viewed by the adoptive gaurdians.
526742433 Adopted Patient RecordAn indication that the medical records being viewed are from a time after a patient's adoption and can be viewed by the adoptive gaurdians.

name: HSPC Adoption Info
description: A set of codes that describe patient info viewing privileges base on adoption status.

concept.definition: An indication that the medical records being viewed are from a time prior to a patient's adoption and therefore cannot be viewed by the adoptive gaurdians.
An indication that the medical records being viewed are from a time after a patient's adoption and can be viewed by the adoptive gaurdians.
